data.eml:eml: A contribution to the knowledge of the subfamily Panagaeinae Hope, 1838 from Africa. Part 2. Revision of the Craspedophorus leprieuri and C. regalis groups (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Häckel, Martin (2017): A contribution to the knowledge of the subfamily Panagaeinae Hope, 1838 from Africa. Part 2. Revision of the Craspedophorus leprieuri and C. regalis groups (Coleoptera: Carabidae). Zootaxa 4236 (2): 201-243, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4236.2.1
